content: to mark the last st of each repeat it will help you to follow the chart and not to get lost  before you start the project think about the yarn tails do you want to hide them as you go to leave as a fringe or you will work a double border  if you plan to leave tails as a fringe keep them more or less the same length i measure with my palm before attaching new yarn into the first st as you need/want the number of chains has to be multiple of 48 4 main repeats of 12 sts + 3 1 border st on each side 1 extra st for the last repeat leave a longer tail cut the yarn fasten_off and start working the next row at the first chain not the last after which you cut the yarn so in case your chain is too short/long you can easily correct that if you start your work with chainless
